name: Dad
storyline:
Harry receives a message from the father he never met. His father wants to meet him and make amends for having abandoned him as a child.

After the meeting between father and son... Harry begins to suspect that his father is hiding something.
summary: "DAD" is a horror game with a bizarre style and story. Inspired by horror and suspense films from the 80s and 90s. With PS1 style graphics.
